sentences.english: On Hubin Road, I walked alongside West Lake beneath swaying willow trees.
sentences.chinese: 在湖濱路，我沿着西湖穿行在搖曳的垂柳下。

sentences.english: A meal that raises blood sugar fast and furiously can leave you dragging like a willow in a windstorm.
sentences.chinese: 讓你血糖猛增的一餐會使你像暴風中的垂柳一樣。

sentences.english: Standing by the swaying willow, I look through half-closed eyes as if in a dream.
sentences.chinese: 我站在飄逸的垂柳邊，彷彿在夢中一般眯着眼。

sentences.english: Weak cigarette sales willows, fog light falling volumes.
sentences.chinese: 煙銷垂柳弱，霧卷落花輕。

sentences.english: She planted by the statue a rose-colored weeping willow.
sentences.chinese: 她在這石像旁邊種了一株像玫瑰花那樣紅的垂柳。

sentences.english: Weeping willows swing in the wind.
It's just the old weeping willows so grey.
The willow's shadow falls on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 垂柳的影子倒映在湖面上。

sentences.english: The branches of the drooping willows were swaying lightly.
The morning breeze is swaying the weeping willows.
Weeping cicada kept crying happily, as if to tell the beautiful brook.
sentences.chinese: 垂柳上的知了不停地歡叫着，彷彿在訴說小溪的美麗。

sentences.english: The weeping willow is taller than the poplar.
sentences.chinese: 這棵垂柳比這棵楊樹高。

sentences.english: Riparian the weeping willow in the evening as the Waterfall Mist Lane, as a capital injection of the rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 河岸的垂柳在黃昏的霧靄裏像瀑布，又像如注的暴雨。

definition: willow tree/poplar and willow/name of traditional tune
green willow and red flowers/all the colors of spring
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
verdant/lush green and full of life
